name: @tenoxui/property
description: Default types and properties for tenoxui css framework.

scripts.build: tsc && terser -o dist/property.min.js dist/property.js -m --source-map url='property.min.js.map' && terser -o dist/property.esm.min.js dist/property.esm.js -m --source-map url='property.esm.min.js.map'

author: NOuSantx
